statements: SELECT instrument_id, symbol, price FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE market = 'US';
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE asset_class = 'Stock' AND price > 100;
SELECT instrument_id, market FROM financial_instruments WHERE asset_class = 'ETF';
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY market DESC, symbol ASC
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_instruments WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT symbol, market FROM financial_instruments WHERE price < 50 AND asset_class = 'Bonds'
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE market = 'NASDAQ' OR market = 'NYSE' ORDER BY symbol
SELECT instrument_id, asset_class, market FROM financial_instruments WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM financial_instruments WHERE type='Stock';
SELECT name, symbol, type FROM financial_instruments WHERE id=3;
SELECT id, type FROM financial_instruments WHERE type IN ('Option', 'Bond');
SELECT * FROM instrument_prices WHERE date='2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE type = 'Stock';
SELECT name, symbol FROM financial_instruments WHERE type = 'Option' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, symbol, type FROM financial_instruments WHERE type = 'Stock' AND id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM instrument_prices GROUP BY symbol HAVING max_price > 1000 ORDER BY max_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY instrument_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT instrument_name, asset_class FROM financial_instruments WHERE asset_class='Equity';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_id, instrument_name, asset_class FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY asset_class ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM financial_instruments WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, asset_class, price FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description, author FROM trading_strategies WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT instrument_id, date, price FROM historical_data WHERE instrument_id = 101 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY price DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, current_price FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange='NYSE';
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, exchange FROM financial_instruments WHERE current_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM instrument_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, current_price FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type='Stock' ORDER BY current_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, current_price FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY instrument_type ASC, current_price DESC;
SELECT MAX(current_price) AS highest_price FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange='NYSE';
SELECT instrument_name, event, event_date FROM financial_instruments JOIN instrument_history ON financial_instruments.id = instrument_history.instrument_id WHERE event='IPO' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, price, date FROM financial_instruments JOIN instrument_prices ON financial_instruments.id = instrument_prices.instrument_id WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments
SELECT market_cap, volume FROM market_data
SELECT symbol, price, trade_date FROM stock_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC
SELECT exchange, country, timezone FROM exchange_info
SELECT symbol, price, trade_date FROM stock_history WHERE symbol='AAPL' AND price > 100
SELECT symbol, name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock'
SELECT symbol, price, price_date FROM instrument_prices ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT market, market_cap, volume FROM market_data WHERE market_cap > 1000000
SELECT symbol, price, trade_date FROM stock_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT exchange, country, timezone FROM exchange_info
